website_summaries.verdict: Uses X-style handles with a curved spout that create an interesting design.
pros: Good construction that should give you a nice value over time
Includes a diverter in the middle so you can add a handheld shower option
X-style handles are labeled C and H for a vintage look
Costs quite a bit less than other claw-foot tub faucet products
cons: Installation can be a challenging process

customer_reviews.title: As nice as faucets costing twice the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic faucet !!! My house was built in 1940 needless to say no repair or upgrade is an easy task. Except replacing the tub fauucet with this one. I did not have to buy any additional fittings and everything lined up! I spent more time researching old and new plumbing and shopping for a faucet that suited my needs and one I could afford. It arrived in 2 days, the faucet was packed in a cloth bag inside the box, in perfect condition.. It is lovely, the hand held showerhead puts out a nice firm spray. I do wish it had a bracket to mount the shower on the. wall..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is beautiful especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Update: changing my review after emailing the company and them shipping out a replacement! Hopefully it was just a bad part to begin with. Have had this faucet for less than 6 months. It was installed on a tub we hardly use (maybe 10 to 15 times since installed at the very most). The threads for the handle have complete disintegrated, which caused water to spray every where. It is beautiful especially for the price, however, poor quality
customer_reviews.author: ljgiles

customer_reviews.title: Very well priced & well crafted
customer_reviews.text: Terrific style and appears to be well crafted. Easily installed and sports great features (1/4 turn handles, nice hand held sprayer) Very well priced, well worth double it's cost!
customer_reviews.author: Trailor

customer_reviews.title: Worst bathtub faucet ever!
customer_reviews.text: It's not installed because every part of it leaked...my fiance & 2 different plumbers tried to install it...it never stopped leaking...& I'm not talking about a trickle, it was constantly pouring out, even from the sprayer...it was leaking from a place that doesn't come apart. Needless to say, I'm very disappointed. I would never buy this brand again!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Hayes

customer_reviews.title: To big
customer_reviews.text: Description says fits Club bath doesn't fit any of my claw bathtubs
customer_reviews.author: Rob Matteson

customer_reviews.title: Needed to modify several things to make it work but looks nice!
customer_reviews.text: It required some modifications to install but I love it! It feels sturdy but time will tell if it will last. At least the modifications have been done so replacement won’t be so stressful, if needed. This seemed like an awesome price for a piece like this so I hope it lasts for a while!
customer_reviews.author: Brittani Beber

customer_reviews.title: It looks great and works well
customer_reviews.text: Had to do some adjusting to make it fit my 100 year old tub. It looks great and works well. A great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Farmer

customer_reviews.title: looks nice, but PIA
customer_reviews.text: this thing was a Headache to install directly onto a tub. needed to buy adapter after adapter. looks nice, but PIA.
customer_reviews.author: J.M.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful functional faucet.
customer_reviews.text: I priced others at $150. This is beautiful and is just what I needed in my old bathtub. I love it. My husband installed it easily.
customer_reviews.author: susanne r.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and works well.
customer_reviews.text: So far it works great. I had to buy adapters so I could mount it to the tub.
customer_reviews.author: Erin patton

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Looks and feels much more expensive than price paid.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good considering most other options are $200+ but you get ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks good considering most other options are $200+ but you get what you pay for. The shower holder was leaking where it attaches to the faucet, and it cracked when I tightened it with not a lot of force. I replaced it with a shower riser.
customer_reviews.author: Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful item . . . we purchased this one which didn't work with out tub.  They kindly accepted our return.
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't the right one for our application. They were great about our return. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: ... a very old claw foot tub and this worked great! We bought the adapters as well
customer_reviews.text: We had a very old claw foot tub and this worked great! We bought the adapters as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kara L. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: I liked. It is very useful and handy whether small ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked . It is very useful and handy whether small washing or showering. The only thing I miss is the different kinds of splashing the head has only one type of spraying.
customer_reviews.author: Ali S

customer_reviews.title: Slow water flow
customer_reviews.text: Pipe extensions were required to make the facet functional and it allows limited water flow. The faucet looks nice but it takes a while to fill the tub.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Lower-priced, but solid product
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, solid construction at a good price. Much cheaper than similar models available, but good quality. I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love how pretty it is but would be a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: I love how pretty it is but would be a lot easier if told the adapter should be purchased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Marshal Ford

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great Service! The faucet was every bit as beautiful as the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Its gorgeous  !
customer_reviews.text: It arrived earlier than expected , which was great, and it's gorgeous !! Totally happy !
customer_reviews.author: Penny R. Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Quality
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and it’s perfect. Excellent quality and easy to install. I’ll purchase another for sure!!
customer_reviews.author: Martha K. McCusker

customer_reviews.title: looks great. We were looking at similar faucets and nothing ...
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived on time, looks great. We were looking at similar faucets and nothing was under 3-400. Feels high end for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Zivich

customer_reviews.title: but it’s very nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Just received this claw foot tub faucet, didn’t put it on yet, but it’s very nice and sturdy. Good priced as well.
customer_reviews.author: jana reinberger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So beautiful and great addition to my laundry room sink.
customer_reviews.author: shelley rost

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it.. Perfect size, no over spray looks amazing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First I found out it had a female end, ...
customer_reviews.text: First I found out it had a female end, my adaptor had a female end. Then when I bought a new adaptor the end cracked as I was trying to tighten it. (the adaptor suggested turned out to be junk so I just went and got a male/male pipe but then discovered my adaptor was a different size than the faucet and it didn't fit. By the time I went through all this the return period had passed and now I have an expensive paper weight.
customer_reviews.author: D. B

customer_reviews.title: NOT compatible w/an AUTHENTIC claw foot tub (1940's era). ...
customer_reviews.text: NOT compatible w/an AUTHENTIC claw foot tub (1940's era). BIG costly mistake I made purchasing this item, as we were NOT able to return it for any sort of refund. :(
customer_reviews.author: The Bridges

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We were pleased with the quality of this faucet. Very heavy and seems to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Morganaa

customer_reviews.title: Love the style.
customer_reviews.text: Good Product. Like the fauct style, but the hand wand is smaller than expected. Still not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Robinson

customer_reviews.title: We bought this and can’t get it not to quit ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this and can’t get it not to quit leaking! We have tried everything and because our remodel of our bathroom we decided to do walmount and it’s still not able to get it to quit leaking. Fustrated
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Is wall mount.
customer_reviews.text: Mounts on wall next to the tub. Google search wall mount claw foot tub faucet. You will see ideas that will make this work.
customer_reviews.author: Boomer

customer_reviews.title: Faucet
customer_reviews.text: Is not for a standard claw foot tub so have to return it. Should have read the description better before ordering it. The price was good so should have known better.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: not happy
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy! Will not work on our "classic clawfoot tub". Holes will not match up. Very beautiful..but very useless to me. Just pray they will exchange or refund!
customer_reviews.author: debbie
